Text:
Dear ULer, Kindly include info which will give us a clue as to what it is. :) 

The name of the book is "Why forgive". The author is Johann Christoph Arnold. 

The book is available for free in the website given above, in English, French, German, Spanish and one other language.

This ebook is the Arabic version. 

There are more books on the site if you are interested. :)
